entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy late this evening. Snow beginning overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow ending late in the afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 4 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Clearing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 20 January 2023
